author: IANS
title: Akshay Kumar stunned with Hardik Rawat's performance
text:
Bollywood's 'Khiladi' Akshay Kumar was impressed by the performance of a contestant of dance reality show 'Dance +'. The actor says he was contemplating to cancel his shoot due to some health issues, but Hardik Rawat's performance made him feel better.

Akshay Kumar 
Akshay was unwell with high temperature and almost cancelled the shoot, but since he had committed, he finally made it. After seeing Hardik's performance, Akshay was stunned.
"I am extremely unwell today and almost cancelled the shoot today. After watching Hardik's performance, I feel I would have missed something which is unbelievable and I would never be able to do. His performance has made me feel better," Akshay said there, according to a source.
The Star Plus show is in its final leg of finding India’s dancing sensation. The show's 'superjudge' Remo D'Souza shot for the semi-finale along with Bollywood superstar Akshay and dancing legend turned director Prabhudheva, who had come to promote their movie “Singh Is Bling”.
Hardik, who is a die-hard fan of Akshay, requested the star to join him and perform a stunt along with him. Despite being unwell, Akshay went on stage and performed a stunt with him.
